snippet.title: Murderous Muses Official Launch Trailer (4k)
snippet.description:
Release date: 12th April 2023
On Steam, Xbox, Playstation, Mac, Steam Deck (Switch to follow).
Questions for the developers? We'll be at the premier, and checking in the comments below!
--
Solve a sinister murder by spending three reality-shifting nights in a haunted art gallery. An infinitely re-playable murder mystery blending deduction, exploration, puzzles, collectibles and FMV.

Wishlist on Steam!:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1727270/Murderous_Muses/

Playstation:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10004400

Official Website and copyright info:
https://murderousmuses.com/

D'Avekki Studios Linktree:
https://linktr.ee/davekki

--
A spine tingling new murder mystery from the creators and writers of The Infectious Madness of Doctor Dekker, The Shapeshifting Detective and Dark Nights with Poe and Munro.
